> f) How about gathering the external environment with a mkillum  
> across the pipe's entrance, then spreading the light in the interior  
> using a second mkillum at the pipe's exit?
Axel - I had a go at this years ago when time for experimentation  
seemed easier to come by.  Can't recall the details, but I think it  
worked passably well for the diffuse component of illumination.  For  
direct however, as expected, it didn't do too well.


-John
